channel.title: Mango on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in Mango on The Guyana Brief

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Mango Tree War
item.description: Everybody on Pike Street know dat de BEST julie mango tree belong to Miss Doreen. Everybody also know dat Miss Doreen does guard dem mango like gold. So when Speedeet come up wid a plan to ’liberate’ some mango… well, yuh know how DIS gon end.
